text: Kim Du-han(korea:김두한, hanja:金斗漢, 1918-1972) was South Korean politician, gangsters. He was one of the boss of big gangsters groups of Seoul. A pen-name was Uisong(의송, 義松). == Site link == * Kim Du-han * Kim Du-han * 야인시대 Category:1918 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Anti-communists Category:Terrorists Category:Gangsters Category:South Korean politicians Category:Murder victims Category:South Korean autobiographers
title: Kim Du-han
